about_the_game:
The "Additional Card Unlock Pass" includes the following content:

Cards will be unlocked progressively as the corresponding DLC is released.

・Card Unlock Vol.1 DZ-BT04「Destined Showdown」

・Card Unlock Vol.2 DZ-BT05「Omniscient Awakening」

・Card Unlock Vol.3 DZ-SS02「Stride Deckset Harri」

・Card Unlock Vol.4 DZ-SS03「Stride Deckset Nightrose」

※Scheduled to be sold by the end of 2025.

※By purchasing each additional card release, you can expand the card pool that can be used in the game. Available types vary depending on each unlock.

※The "Additional Card Release Pass" and the contents can be purchased separately for each item, but the contents of the additional contents will only be reflected once, so please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
